generic.name: Standard
generic.description: Set of primary colors in standard order. Use for stock Crayola, store brand or movable primary color pans.

generic-pen-single.name: Single pen/pencil
generic-pen-single.description: Single color, use when only one implement needed.

generic-pen-multi.name: Multi pen/pencil
generic-pen-multi.description: Standard set of primary color pens/pencils.
